direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve clearing and reinitializing the collection's state.
Both methods modify the internal state of the collection by removing elements.
Both methods involve modifying the index, though in opposite directions (adding vs. removing).

enhanced_by.reason: Initializing the collection before clearing ensures a known state.
Reindexing after clearing ensures the collection is in a consistent state.
Verifying the collection is empty after clearing ensures the method worked as expected.
